Constructor Detail

WeightedMultiplicativeBinary

public WeightedMultiplicativeBinary(Tree tree,
                                    double epsilon)
Parameters:
epsilon - - the default number of occurences for each clade which wasn't observed to guarantee non-zero probabilities

WeightedMultiplicativeBinary

public WeightedMultiplicativeBinary(TreeTrace[] traces,
                                    double epsilon,
                                    int burnIn,
                                    boolean verbose)
Parameters:
traces - - samples of trees in a tree traces array.
epsilon - - the default number of occurences for each clade which wasn't observed to guarantee non-zero probabilities
burnIn - - number of trees discarded from the trace
verbose - - hide the runtime status and outputs
Method Detail

analyzeTrace

public void analyzeTrace(boolean verbose)
Actually analyzes the trace given the burn-in. Each tree from the trace is read and the conditional clade frequencies incremented.

Parameters:
verbose - if true then progress is logged to stdout

Specified by:
splitClade in class AbstractCladeImportanceDistribution
Parameters:

Returns:

getPossibleChildren

private java.util.List<Clade> getPossibleChildren(Clade parent)
Finds all possible children clades which we have observed already. A clade is a possible child clade if is a subset of taxa of the parent

Parameters:
parent - - the parent clade of which we want to find the possible children
Returns:
a List of the possible child clades
